solution_line_template: Currently, Mark is reading books for {reading_hours_per_day} * {days_in_week} = <<{reading_hours_per_day}*{days_in_week}={current_weekly_reading_hours}>>{current_weekly_reading_hours} hours weekly.

His goal is to read books, for {current_weekly_reading_hours} + {increase_weekly_hours} = <<{current_weekly_reading_hours}+{increase_weekly_hours}={goal_weekly_reading_hours}>>{goal_weekly_reading_hours} hours during one week.
